bot_rnm.hello_dar_vis: Hey there! I'm DAR Vis, your virtual AI assistant in the darlean Ecosystem. My goal is to automate your daily tasks, save you time, and boost efficiency. Stay tuned and explore available commands.
bot_rnm.personal_assistant_agent1_description: Optimize your meetings and task organization with our Personal Assistant Agent. Enjoy meeting summaries and seamless task creation.
bot_rnm.personal_assistant_agent2_description: Effortlessly locate any document with contextual search through our interactive document chat.
bot_rnm.intro_question: How can I help you today?
bot_rnm.request_error: Seems like there was an issue processing your request. Please try again
bot_rnm.input_error: We couldn't understand your request. Make sure to use valid characters and try again.
bot_rnm.response_meeting_summary: Thanks for the clarification! Here is a summary of the meeting:
bot_rnm.response_doc_search: Hey there, Alidar! Which document are you looking for?
bot_rnm.response_doc_search_answer_1: Based on your search for "...", here are the relevant documents:
bot_rnm.goodbye_other_intents: Sad to see you go. Perhaps you could explore other options?
bot_rnm.personal_assistant_initial_text: Hi there! I'm DAR Vis — your virtual AI assistant in the darlean ecosystem. I'm here to automate your daily tasks, save time and increase your efficiency. Stay tuned for updates and explore available commands now!
bot_rnm.corporate_secretary_initial_text: Hi there! I'm DAR Vis — your virtual AI assistant in the darlean ecosystem. I'm here to automate your daily tasks, save time and increase your efficiency. Stay tuned for updates and explore available commands now!
bot_rnm.personal_assistant_description: Optimize your meetings and task management with our personal assistant. Enjoy meeting summaries and the ability to create tasks quickly
bot_rnm.corporate_secretary_description: Find any document within your system using the contextual search provided by our personal assistant. This feature enables document interaction through an interactive chat.
bot_rnm.error_rag_documents_not_found: No documents found for your request
bot_rnm.suggest_tasks_after_meeting_summary: Would you like to receive tasks related to this meeting?
bot_rnm.here_are_the_task_you_asked_for: Here is the task you requested
bot_rnm.try_again_later: It appears there was an error in processing your request. Please try again later
bot_rnm.empty_array: You do not have such tasks
bot_rnm.what_can_i_do_more_for_you: What else can I do for you?
bot_rnm.number_of_tasks: The number of tasks you have requested:
